p: In summary, this research demonstrated that A. muricata and C. trifoliatum extracts substantially inhibited the growth of A. triangularis trophozoites and cysts. Synergistic effect of A. muricata extract combined with chlorhexidine against A. triangularis trophozoites was observed. Furthermore, both A. muricata and C. trifoliatum extracts showed partial synergy in combination with chlorhexidine against A. triangularis cysts. Both extracts considerably inhibited the adhesion of A. triangularis trophozoites and cysts to the plastic surface. Also, pre-treatment of the plastic surface with A. muricata at 1/2×MIC significantly diminished 90% of the cyst adhesion, compared with the control. It has been highlighted that the trophozoites treated with A. muricata and C. trifoliatum extracts have lost strong acanthopodia.
